thread.title: Angola: Minea Aims to Increase Energy Supply By 2017
thread.title_full: Angola: Minea Aims to Increase Energy Supply By 2017

title: Angola: Minea Aims to Increase Energy Supply By 2017
text:
South Africa: Worst 'Hell Week' in History of Idols SA 
He noted that there have been concluded electrification projects for the municipal headquarters of Dinge, Bucozau, and Belize in Cabinda province, having their works in progress for the construction of mv/bt networks. 
He added that it is completed the second phase of the solar village program, which has been submitted for the approval of mapping studies and solar and wind potential identification of the country. 
João Baptista Borges revealed that in the water subsector during the first half of this year there have been significant advances with the completion of construction of water supply infrastructure that allowed serving 111,820 inhabitants with drinking water as a result of the implementation of the water program for all , which has a degree of implementation of about 61,74 per cent in the rural population, 80 percent planned, rehabilitation and expansion of urban water and sanitation systems.
